verses.verse: O give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> upon his <S%H8034>name:<s%> make <S%H3045>known<s%> his <S%H5949>deeds<s%> among the <S%H5971>people.<s%>
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto him, sing <S%H2167>psalms<s%> unto him: <S%H7878>talk<s%> ye of <S%H3605>all<s%> his wondrous <S%H6381>works.<s%>
Glory <S%H1984><s%> ye in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name:<s%> let the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of them <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
Seek <S%H1875><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H5797>strength:<s%> <S%H1245>seek<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H8548>evermore.<s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his marvelous <S%H6381>works<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he hath <S%H6213>done;<s%> his <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth;<s%>
O ye <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> ye <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> his <S%H972>chosen.<s%>
He <S%H1931><s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God:<s%> his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He hath <S%H2142>remembered<s%> his <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> covenant he <S%H3772>made<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and his <S%H7621>oath<s%> unto <S%H3446>Isaac;<s%>
And <S%H5975>confirmed<s%> the same unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> for a <S%H2706>law,<s%> and to <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> covenant: <S%H1285><s%>
Saying, <S%H559><s%> Unto thee will I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> the <S%H2256>lot<s%> of your inheritance: <S%H5159><s%>
When they <S%H1961>were<s%> but a few <S%H4962>men<s%> in <S%H4557>number;<s%> yea, very <S%H4592>few,<s%> and <S%H1481>strangers<s%> in it.

When they <S%H1980>went<s%> from one <S%H4480>nation<s%> <S%H1471><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1471>another,<s%> from one <S%H4480>kingdom<s%> <S%H4467><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%>
He <S%H5117>suffered<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> to do them <S%H6231>wrong:<s%> yea, he <S%H3198>reproved<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> for their <S%H5921>sakes;<s%>
Saying, <S%H5060>Touch<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> mine <S%H4899>anointed,<s%> and do my <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H7489>harm.<s%>
Moreover he called <S%H7121>for<s%> a <S%H7458>famine<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>land:<s%> he <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them, even <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> who was <S%H4376>sold<s%> for a servant: <S%H5650><s%>
Whose <S%H7272>feet<s%> they <S%H6031>hurt<s%> with <S%H3525>fetters:<s%> <S%H5315>he<s%> was <S%H935>laid<s%> in iron: <S%H1270><s%>
Until <S%H5704><s%> the <S%H6256>time<s%> that his <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H935>came:<s%> the <S%H565>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6884>tried<s%> him.
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H5425>loosed<s%> him; even the <S%H4910>ruler<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and let him go <S%H6605>free.<s%>
He <S%H7760>made<s%> him <S%H113>lord<s%> of his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4910>ruler<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> his substance: <S%H7075><s%>
To <S%H631>bind<s%> his <S%H8269>princes<s%> at his <S%H5315>pleasure;<s%> and teach his <S%H2205>senators<s%> <S%H2449>wisdom.<s%>
Israel <S%H3478><s%> also came <S%H935>into<s%> <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H1481>sojourned<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham.<s%>
And he <S%H6509>increased<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3966>greatly;<s%> and made them <S%H6105>stronger<s%> than their <S%H4480>enemies.<s%> <S%H6862><s%>
He <S%H2015>turned<s%> their <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H8130>hate<s%> his <S%H5971>people,<s%> to deal <S%H5230>subtlely<s%> with his <S%H5650>servants.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> his <S%H5650>servant;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H977>chosen.<s%>
They <S%H7760>showed<s%> his <S%H1697>signs<s%> <S%H226><s%> among them, and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2526>Ham.<s%>
He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and made it <S%H2821>dark;<s%> and they <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853>against<s%> his <S%H1697>word.<s%>
He <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4325>waters<s%> into <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and <S%H4191>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H1710>fish.<s%>
Their <S%H776>land<s%> brought forth frogs in <S%H8317>abundance,<s%> <S%H6854><s%> in the <S%H2315>chambers<s%> of their <S%H4428>kings.<s%>
He <S%H559>spoke,<s%> and there <S%H935>came<s%> divers sorts of <S%H6157>flies,<s%> and <S%H3654>lice<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H1366>coasts.<s%>
He <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H1259>hail<s%> for <S%H1653>rain,<s%> and <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in their <S%H776>land.<s%>
He <S%H5221>smote<s%> their <S%H1612>vines<s%> also and their fig <S%H8384>trees;<s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of their <S%H1366>coasts.<s%>
He <S%H559>spoke,<s%> and the <S%H697>locusts<s%> <S%H935>came,<s%> and <S%H3218>caterpillars,<s%> and that <S%H369>without<s%> <S%H4557>number,<s%>
And did eat <S%H398>up<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6212>herbs<s%> in their <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their <S%H127>ground.<s%>
He <S%H5221>smote<s%> also <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> in their <S%H776>land,<s%> the <S%H7225>chief<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H202>strength.<s%>
He brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> also with <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold:<s%> and there was <S%H369>not<s%> one <S%H3782>feeble<s%> person among their <S%H7626>tribes.<s%>
Egypt <S%H4714><s%> was <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H3318>departed:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of them <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them.
He <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> for a <S%H4539>covering;<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> to give <S%H215>light<s%> in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>
The people <S%H7592>asked,<s%> and he <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7958>quails,<s%> and <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven.<s%>
He <S%H6605>opened<s%> the <S%H6697>rock,<s%> and the <S%H4325>waters<s%> gushed <S%H2100>out;<s%> they <S%H1980>ran<s%> in the dry <S%H6723>places<s%> like a <S%H5104>river.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1697>promise,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H5650>servant.<s%>
And he brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H8342>joy,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> his <S%H972>chosen<s%> with gladness: <S%H7440><s%>
And <S%H5414>gave<s%> them the <S%H776>lands<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen:<s%> and they <S%H3423>inherited<s%> the <S%H5999>labor<s%> of the <S%H3816>people;<s%>
That <S%H5668><s%> they might <S%H8104>observe<s%> his <S%H2706>statutes,<s%> and <S%H5341>keep<s%> his <S%H8451>laws.<s%> <S%H1984>Praise<s%> ye the <S%H3050>LORD.<s%>
